## Description The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently. ## K 5 CLASSIC Der leicht transportier- und verstaubare K 5 Classic-Hochdruckreiniger, inkl. innovativer Schlauchaufbewahrung, ist bestens für regelmäßige Einsätze bei mittelstarkem Schmutz geeignet. ## Text Content - **Bestell-Nr.**: 1.950-700.0 - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Sehr kompaktes, leicht zu transportierendes und einfach zu verstaubendes Reinigungsgerät - Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529057884
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14,5
Fördermenge l/h max. 500
Flächenleistung m²/h 40
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 2,1
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 5,6
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 8
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 188 × 252 × 445
## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch 8 m
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugung
Teleskopgriff [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
Wasseransaugung [x]
## Description The image shows a pressure washer with several components. The main unit is predominantly yellow with black accents. It has a compact, upright design with two large wheels for mobility. A black hose is coiled around the top of the unit, and there is a handle for easy transportation. The front of the unit features a circular dial and a connector for the hose. In front of the main unit, there are three separate attachments: 1. **Spray Gun**: A black handle with a trigger, designed to connect to the hose for directing water flow. 2. **Lance Attachment**: A long, black extension piece that connects to the spray gun, allowing for extended reach. 3. **Rotary Nozzle**: A specialized nozzle attachment that provides a rotating spray pattern for more effective cleaning. The pressure washer is designed for tasks such as cleaning vehicles, driveways, and outdoor surfaces. The combination of attachments allows for versatility in cleaning applications. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Figure Description The image is a graphic representation featuring a large number "1" in a light gray color on the left side. Overlapping the number is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads: **WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE GRAPHIC DESIGNER BRAND** The text is bold and black, contrasting with the yellow background, making it highly visible. The design suggests a focus on being a leading or top-ranked brand in the freelance graphic design industry. The use of the number "1" and the phrase "WORLD'S NO. 1" emphasizes a claim of being the best or most popular in this field. ## Description The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with the European Union (EU) flag design. The EU flag consists of a circle of 12 gold stars on a blue background. Below the shape, the text "Made in Europe" is written. This logo likely indicates that a product is manufactured within Europe, emphasizing European origin and quality standards. ## Figure Description The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized depiction of a power plug and socket, with a lightning bolt symbol above it, indicating electricity or power. Below the graphic, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The design suggests an emphasis on increased power or efficiency, possibly related to an electrical or energy context. ## Description The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable power setting. The nozzle is shown emitting a spray, and there is a plus sign (+) indicating an increase in power. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, which suggests a focus on visibility and caution. The icon likely represents a feature of a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the spray. ## Figure Description The image is a cropped section of a document labeled as a "figure." It contains a diagram or chart with the following details: - **Title**: The figure does not have a visible title in the crop. - **Axes**: - **X-axis**: Labeled with numerical values ranging from 0 to 100, increasing in increments of 10. - **Y-axis**: Labeled with numerical values ranging from 0 to 10, increasing in increments of 1. - **Data Representation**: - The chart appears to be a line graph with a single line plotted across the grid. - The line starts at the origin (0,0) and shows an upward trend, reaching a peak around the middle of the graph. - After the peak, the line descends slightly and then stabilizes towards the end. - **Annotations**: - There are no visible annotations or labels on the line itself. - No legends or additional text are present in the crop. - **Visual Elements**: - The grid is composed of evenly spaced horizontal and vertical lines. - The line is solid and dark, contrasting against the lighter grid background. This description captures the essential elements of the figure, providing a clear understanding of its content without needing to view the original image. I'm unable to accurately read the text from the image provided. The text appears to be blurred or unclear. If you can provide a clearer image or additional context, I'd be happy to help further!

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently.

## K 5 CLASSIC

Der leicht transportier- und verstaubare K 5 Classic-Hochdruckreiniger, inkl. innovativer Schlauchaufbewahrung, ist bestens für regelmäßige Einsätze bei mittelstarkem Schmutz geeignet.

## Text Content

- **Bestell-Nr.**: 1.950-700.0
- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Sehr kompaktes, leicht zu transportierendes und einfach zu verstaubendes Reinigungsgerät
- Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529057884
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14,5
Fördermenge l/h max. 500
Flächenleistung m²/h 40
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 2,1
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 5,6
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 8
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 188 × 252 × 445

## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch 8 m
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugung
Teleskopgriff [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
Wasseransaugung [x]

## Description

The image shows a pressure washer with several components. The main unit is predominantly yellow with black accents. It has a compact, upright design with two large wheels for mobility. A black hose is coiled around the top of the unit, and there is a handle for easy transportation. The front of the unit features a circular dial and a connector for the hose.

In front of the main unit, there are three separate attachments:

1. **Spray Gun**: A black handle with a trigger, designed to connect to the hose for directing water flow.

2. **Lance Attachment**: A long, black extension piece that connects to the spray gun, allowing for extended reach.

3. **Rotary Nozzle**: A specialized nozzle attachment that provides a rotating spray pattern for more effective cleaning.

The pressure washer is designed for tasks such as cleaning vehicles, driveways, and outdoor surfaces. The combination of attachments allows for versatility in cleaning applications.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Figure Description

The image is a graphic representation featuring a large number "1" in a light gray color on the left side. Overlapping the number is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads:

**WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE GRAPHIC DESIGNER BRAND**

The text is bold and black, contrasting with the yellow background, making it highly visible. The design suggests a focus on being a leading or top-ranked brand in the freelance graphic design industry. The use of the number "1" and the phrase "WORLD'S NO. 1" emphasizes a claim of being the best or most popular in this field.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with the European Union (EU) flag design. The EU flag consists of a circle of 12 gold stars on a blue background. Below the shape, the text "Made in Europe" is written. This logo likely indicates that a product is manufactured within Europe, emphasizing European origin and quality standards.

## Figure Description

The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized depiction of a power plug and socket, with a lightning bolt symbol above it, indicating electricity or power. Below the graphic, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The design suggests an emphasis on increased power or efficiency, possibly related to an electrical or energy context.

## Description

The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable power setting. The nozzle is shown emitting a spray, and there is a plus sign (+) indicating an increase in power. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, which suggests a focus on visibility and caution. The icon likely represents a feature of a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the spray.

## Figure Description

The image is a cropped section of a document labeled as a "figure." It contains a diagram or chart with the following details:

- **Title**: The figure does not have a visible title in the crop.
- **Axes**: 
  - **X-axis**: Labeled with numerical values ranging from 0 to 100, increasing in increments of 10.
  - **Y-axis**: Labeled with numerical values ranging from 0 to 10, increasing in increments of 1.
- **Data Representation**: 
  - The chart appears to be a line graph with a single line plotted across the grid.
  - The line starts at the origin (0,0) and shows an upward trend, reaching a peak around the middle of the graph.
  - After the peak, the line descends slightly and then stabilizes towards the end.
- **Annotations**: 
  - There are no visible annotations or labels on the line itself.
  - No legends or additional text are present in the crop.
- **Visual Elements**: 
  - The grid is composed of evenly spaced horizontal and vertical lines.
  - The line is solid and dark, contrasting against the lighter grid background.

This description captures the essential elements of the figure, providing a clear understanding of its content without needing to view the original image.
